author: p2pFreak
comment: This app would be good if it worked. I am getting error code:4005 when I try to send a file. Please fix and I'll rate 5 stars.
title: Samsung galaxy s4 paired with moto 360 gen 2 not working!

comment: Its a great app that lets you upload anything but it doesnt say how to delete the files that you've uploaded
title: Great App, only problem, I cant figure out how to delete uploaded stuff

comment: This app does exactly what it is advertised to do and I have had no problems!  I recommend the cheap ad removal and keep up the good work!
title: Works great!
